byline.contributor: Peter Baker contributed reporting from Washington, and Michael Wolgelenter from London.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s behavior has proved “what we have been saying for more than 30 years,” Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said.
snippet: Mr. Trump’s behavior has proved “what we have been saying for more than 30 years,” Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said....

headline.main: Iran’s Supreme Leader Thanks Trump for Showing America’s ‘True Face’
headline.print_headline: Ayatollah Calls Trump ‘True Face’ of the U.S.
